detailMetrics.label: from manual hours to automated minutes

left.heading: Project Overview
left.text: Automating Design Token Extraction for Better Design-Dev Handoff

left.heading: The Problem
left.text: Design teams manually extract and share design tokens from Figma, leading to inconsistencies, versioning issues, and time wasted on repetitive tasks. Teams needed an automated solution that respects existing GitHub workflows.

left.heading: The Solution
left.text: A Figma plugin that automatically extracts design tokens (colours, typography, spacing, variables) and pushes them to GitHub repositories or downloads locally, with comprehensive error handling and security considerations.

left.heading: Process
left.text:
Research and Planning:
- Identified core requirements from design systems workflows
- Mapped technical constraints of Figma's plugin environment
- Defined architecture supporting both GitHub and local distribution
